attributes.action: To reduce the working week to four days.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the working week neeeds to be reduced to 4 days to give people more leasure time and create more jobs for the unemployed. All working people would be compensated by receiving two days pay for the day they take off - the extra money would help stimulate the economy and encourage working.
